title: Exploring Rust HashSet Operations
description: In this lab, we explore the functionalities of the HashSet data structure in Rust, which guarantees unique elements and can perform operations such as union, difference, intersection, and symmetric difference on sets.

meta.title: Exploring Rust HashSet Operations
meta.description: Discover the powerful features of Rust's HashSet data structure, including set operations like union, difference, intersection, and symmetric difference.
meta.keywords: Rust, HashSet, set operations, data structures, programming tutorials
